sentences.en: "Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?"—"Good question."
sentences.cn: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”

sentences.en: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.
sentences.cn: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。

sentences.en: all of the old certainties are in question.
sentences.cn: 以往所有的定论都令人怀疑。

sentences.en: Can I ask you a question?
sentences.cn: 我能问你个问题吗？

sentences.en: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question.
sentences.cn: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。

sentences.en: Frankly, Thomas, this question of your loan is beginning to worry me.
sentences.cn: 老实讲，托马斯，你贷款的问题开始让我担心了。

sentences.en: Having identified the problem, the question arises of how to overcome it.
sentences.cn: 发现问题后，如何克服它的问题又出现了。

sentences.en: He grimaced slightly, obviously expecting no answer to his rhetorical question.
sentences.cn: 他微微皱了下眉头，显然并不期待任何人回答他的反问。

sentences.en: He looked back at the abject, silent girl and repeated his question.
sentences.cn: 他转过头看着这个噤若寒蝉的女孩，又重复了一遍他的问题。

sentences.en: He said in reply that the question was unfair.
sentences.cn: 他回答说这个问题不公平。

sentences.en: I don't quite know what to say in answer to your question.
sentences.cn: 我不太清楚如何回答你的问题。

sentences.en: I’m afraid I can’t answer that question.
sentences.cn: 我恐怕无法回答那个问题。

sentences.en: Is a tax increase still out of the question?
sentences.cn: 增加税收仍然是不可能的事吗？

sentences.en: It is an open question how long that commitment can last.
sentences.cn: 这一承诺能维持多久还不确定。

sentences.en: Joseph questioned the doctors closely (= asked them a lot of questions ).
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫问了医生很多问题。

sentences.en: Later Mr Moi raised the vexed question of refugees.
sentences.cn: 后来莫伊先生提出了那个让人头疼的难民问题。

sentences.en: Look at the information that precedes the paragraph in question.
sentences.cn: 查看正在讨论的这段文字前面的信息。

sentences.en: on the day in question, there were several serious emergencies.
sentences.cn: 就在那一天，发生了几件严重的紧急事件。

sentences.en: our Sunday Trading laws have come into question.
sentences.cn: 我们的星期日贸易法已得到进一步讨论。

sentences.en: People want to dissect his work and question his motives.
sentences.cn: 人们想仔细分析他的作品，并对他的动机提出质疑。

sentences.en: Starting over is out of the question.
sentences.cn: 从头开始是不可能的

sentences.en: technology had brought into question the whole future of work.
sentences.cn: 技术促使人们进一步考虑整个工作前景。

sentences.en: The question is: Is this what we really want?
sentences.cn: 问题在于：这是我们真正想要的吗？

sentences.en: Two men have been arrested and questioned.
sentences.cn: 已有两名男子被捕并受到盘问。

words.tran_cn: 可疑地，不清楚地；不可靠地

phrases.tran_cn: 回答这个问题；（马在赛马前测试时）跑得很好
只是时间问题，迟早会发生
adv. 毫无疑问；无可争辩
使人们进一步考虑（或讨论）某事
好问题；不易回答的问题
待决的问题；容易讨论的问题
（正式辩论或会议用语）把议题提请表决
反问；设问；修辞性疑问句
安全问题；找回密码问题；安全提问

trans.tran_en: a sentence or phrase that is used to ask for information or to test someone’s knowledge
to ask someone questions in order to get information about something such as a crime

trans.tran_cn: 询问， 审问； 怀疑， 对…表示疑问
trans.tran_en: to ask someone questions in order to get information about something such as a crime
